data.comment: The match has started at bet365 Stadium.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through James McClean.
In the minute 41, Angus MacDonald (Rotherham) gets a yellow card.
The first-half is over at bet365 Stadium.
Darren Bond has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 59, Paul Warne is making the team's first substitution at bet365 Stadium with Michael Smith replacing Jamie Lindsay.
Matt Crooks is on a sub for Shaun MacDonald for Rotherham.
The away team have replaced Freddie Ladapo with George Hirst. This is the third substitution made today by Paul Warne.
In the minute 71, Michael Smith is booked for the away team.
Stoke make their first substitution with Jordan Cousins replacing Jordan Thompson.
Michael O'Neill (Stoke) is making a second substitution, with Jacob Brown replacing Tyrese Campbell.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Tashan Oakley-Boothe is replacing Nick Powell for the home team.
Morgan Fox (Stoke) has received a yellow card from Darren Bond.
